name: Proof_352 — Morning Banana Garden Clearing at the Back of the Farm MaMeeFarm | DGCP™
description:
This proof documents morning farm labor focused on clearing and cutting vegetation in the banana garden area at MaMeeFarm, recorded on
18 December 2025 at 08:00 AM (GMT+7).

The image shows MaMee standing in the back area of the farm near banana plants, holding a long hand tool used for cutting and clearing. The surrounding ground vegetation and trimmed banana leaves indicate active maintenance work in progress.

This activity supports basic farm operations by reducing overgrowth, improving access and visibility, and maintaining usable space around productive plants. It reflects routine, manual farm maintenance performed under natural daylight conditions without mechanized equipment.

This record is captured as-is, without staging or enhancement, in accordance with DGCP principles of ground-truth documentation, transparency, and temporal accuracy.
The embedded timestamp in the image provides verifiable temporal evidence and continuity within MaMeeFarm’s daily proof archive.
This proof is part of the official DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection on OpenSea and is distributed via IPFS (ipfs.io) for immutable reference.
